articles.content:
Military exercises projected in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- When the tense military situation was prevailing, the joint chiefs of staff headquarters of the South Korean army announced that tank field exercises would be staged in Ryoju, Richon, areas of the south Han River and other places of Kyonggi Province from Oct. 29 to Nov. 3, according to MBC from Seoul.
 The headquarters hinted that during the exercises traffic would be partially controlled due to the movement of troops and military equipment.
